packages_h.introhelpTxt1: The Application packages feature allows you to upload 3rd party application packages for use on this Axis product. Listed under Applications > Packages are the packages that have already been installed. Click on the name to open the menu options Settings, License and About.
packages_h.introhelpTxt2: Settings - is dependent on the application package.
packages_h.introhelpTxt3: License - Once uploaded a license is needed to run the application. If there is an Internet connection Automatic Installation will appear in the web page. If there is no Internet Connection go to www.axis.com to acquire a License key file. You will need a license code and the device's serial number to receive a license key.
packages_h.introhelpTxt4: About - Shows where to go for support for this application.
packages_h.uploadTxt1: To upload an application, browse to the package and click Upload Package.
packages_h.uploadTxt2: Installed Applications - A list of installed packages along with the version of the application, the vendor that authored the package, the status of the application and if a license key is installed. The status can assume the following values:
packages_h.uploadTxt3: Not Running - The application has not been started.
packages_h.uploadTxt4: Idle - The application has been started, but no event trigger has been configured for the application. The Idle status is dependent on the type of application installed and is not used in all applications. Refer to the uploaded application's user's guide for more information.
packages_h.uploadTxt5: Running - The application is up and fully running.
packages_h.uploadTxt7: Remove - To delete an application package, select it and click Remove.
packages_h.uploadTxt8: Log - To generate a log of the application happenings, select an application and click Log. This log will be helpful when requesting support from the vendor of the application package.
